title: @RIOT Captain Fortune Missing Animation Thread W/ Video Comparasion. Repost
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVP5l7Rz9G4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2YTBHDGiTg

The previous thread I made was acknowledged, But it has been over two months and It still hasn't been fixed.

replies.body:
Hey CatSith -

This is something that's on our radar to resolve, however, it's a bit lower in priority, as compared to other bugs. Thanks for the report!
Its been 8 months Katey! Do you know if this is being fixed soon? :(
Hey! Why yes, it should be fixed in the next patch, actually! Sorry for the delay. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=pXan4YyV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-03T18:28:01.869+0000)
>
>  it's a bit lower in priority

Looks like its going to take some time, for now, dont use the skin if it bothers you
